scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start" "cd server && cd config && node seed.js"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start" "cd server && cd config && node seed.js"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install npm && npm run build
